products.label: Retrieval Augmented Generation Pattern
products.name: Retrieval_Augmented_Generation_Pattern
products.short_description: An automated solution that deploys a sample application illustrating how to implement the RAG Pattern with watson.ai and IBM Cloud services.

features.title: Retrieval Augmented Generation sample pattern
features.description: Deploy a banking retrieval augmented generation (RAG) sample application to IBM Cloud Code Engine using Continous Delivery.

features.title: Ensure Observability
features.description: The architecture provides observability by deploying services such as IBM Log Analysis, IBM Monitoring, IBM Activity Tracker, and log retention through Cloud Object Storage buckets.

features.title: Implement Security
features.description: The architecture ensures security by deploying IBM Key Protect and IBM Secrets Manager.

features.title: Achieve Regulatory Compliance
features.description: The architecture ensures regulatory compliance by implementing CI/CD/CC pipelines, along with IBM Security Compliance Center (SCC) for secure application lifecycle management.

features.title: Establish Trust
features.description: The architecture ensures trust by configuring the IBM Cloud account to align with compliance settings as defined in the Financial Services framework.

configuration.description: A prefix added to the name of all resources created by this solution. Used to avoid name clashes in the target account when existing this solution multiple times.
The API Key used to provision all resources created in this solution.

The key used to sign the application image built by the CI pipeline deployed in this solution; please refer to the documentation at https://github.com/terraform-ibm-modules/stack-retrieval-augmented-generation/blob/main/README.md for generating the key; if not set, all resources will deploy successfully, but the initial CI pipeline execution will fail at the signing step.
The region in which all resources are deployed.

The name of the resource group that is created by this solution. The actual name is prefixed with the value of the input 'prefix'.  All resources created by this solution are deployed in this resource group.
The API key used to provision the watson project resources. If not set, the API key used to deploy the solution is used.
The service/pricing plan to use when provisioning a new Secrets Manager instance. Only one trial instance is allowed per account.
The CRN of an existing secret manager instance to use in this solution. If not set, a new secret manager instance is provisioned.

Whether to provision logging and monitoring instances are configured to receive all platform logs and metrics in the target region. There can only be one instance per region provisioned for platform logs/metrics.
The URL to the public git repository containing the sample rag application code.
